{{Envisaged Echo Intro}}

==Challenge Objectives==
Protect the target and defeat all opponents.

==Special Rules==
Your character will be inflicted with [[Smoldering Flames]] during this challenge, causing you to continuously {{Color|bp|take Pyro DMG}} until the inflicted Pyro element is removed.
